prev.title: Voice: Interacting With a Voice Campaign in Draft Mode

title: Voice: Interacting With a Sent Voice Campaign
body:
Voice: Interacting With a Sent Voice Campaign¶

Once your voice campaign has been sent, you may perform the following actions.
You will need to have navigated to the desired voice campaign to follow the steps below.

  1. Click and click Resend Campaign

    • Curate the list of recipients of the voice campaign under To (Refer to Creating a New Voice Campaign for options)

    • You can opt to Schedule Delivery instead of the default option to Send Immediately by selecting a date and entering a time

    • Click Resend

  2. Click and click Delete Campaign

    • Click Yes

    • Note that in addition to your voice campaign, all associated workflows and performance data will be deleted

  3. Click View Workflow to view your voice campaign workflow
